amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $285 million and to reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by a similar amount.

action.text: Mr. Simpson raised a point of order against the Polis amendment (A017). Mr. Simpson stated that the amendment sought to amend portions of the bill not yet read and was not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Polis.
